WorkItem.Description: When loading char (Guntrada@Gilneas/EU is discipline priest) from battle.net, all Items listed have value 0. If i switch to Class/Model: Priest->ShadowPriest (2nd spec) items are displayed with values.

Comments.Message:
Very confirmed. Also for holy.

Any quick workaround?
The entire HealPriest model gives no data, even if just creating a new character from scratch and selecting that model.
HealPriest has not been set up for Cataclysm yet. Do not attempt to use HealPriest for any gearing decisions (even if you could) until the Dev catches it up.

http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Models says that HealPriest is actively maintained, and partially cata-ready. Can the documentation be updated to reflect the actual status (and perhaps an ETA be provided?)
Updated Status to Non-Functional. There is no ETA.
Note that in the Version Notes, there was nothing to suggest that HealPriest has been worked on.
I'm having this problem too.  Was there a fix that I can't find?
Cat has been out for months now, when are you guys going to get around to the poor neglected Holy Priest? Seriously. I feel completely gimped without Rawr...

I've started working on this again, and I hope to have something useable out soon.

Since I decided to more or less write the entire module from scratch, don't expect it to act correctly or work as it did under WotLK. It will take some time, but I hope to have it working good before Firelands.
Model has reached Partially status for next version. It may also reach Mostly status before that time.
That's awesome. I owe someone some fresh baked cookies :)
